works.name: Aleksander Fret – CV
works.description: My CV online – you're just watching it :-)

works.name: Amusement Parks
works.description: Final project of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree Program (Udacity, Google). Focused mainly on React and using APIs, but engages many other skills. This is the map presenting european amusement parks, with the possibility to filter them and to display detailed information about them.

works.name: MyReads
works.description: Application for browsing a set of books, allowing for its filtering and adding books to the one of three shelves (categories). The project was created during Front-End Developer Nanodegree Program (Udacity, Google) in order to strengthen skills of using React library as well as using API.

works.name: Restaurant Reviews
works.description: Application for browsing information about restaurants. Improving of its original version was one of the tasks during Front-End Developer Nanodegree Program (Udacity, Google). The program has been enriched with: service worker, accessibility, RWD.

works.name: Arcade Game
works.description: This arcade game is focused on OOP with JS ES6 (especially encapsulation and inheritance). It was created in the scope of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree Program (Udacity, Google).

works.name: Memory Game
works.description: Classic memory game created in the scope of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree Program (Udacity, Google). Besides the main functionality, application offers confguration options (difficulty level, appearance).

works.name: Pixel Art Maker
works.description: This graphic application was created in the scope of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree Program (Udacity, Google). It provides various tools to draw on grid-based canvas.

works.name: Wilmat company website
works.description: The website for Wilmat company (sector of the low voltage installations).

works.name: Psychotherapist website
works.description: The website of Emilia Fret, the psychotherapist.

works.name: Artist website
works.description: The website of Ewa Fret, the artist (ilustrations, handicrafts).
